definition: The state or quality of being closed or united; cohesion or solidarity. It is most usually used to describe a sense of unity or togetherness within a group or organization.
examples: Die Geschlossenheit der Gruppe beeindruckt mich.
I am impressed by the unity of the group.
Die Geschlossenheit der Familie ist bewundernswert.
The unity of the family is admirable.

The unity of the team led to victory.
